comments.body:
this is failing, and I'm not sure how to resolve:
```
...
error: policycoreutils-newrole-2.6-6.fc26.x86_64: install failed
...
Error unpacking rpm package policycoreutils-newrole-2.6-6.fc26.x86_64                                      
policycoreutils-newrole-2.6-6.fc26.x86_64 was supposed to be installed but is not! 
```
This is odd, simple `make image` in test/images/volumes-tester/rbd works for me. Can it be a stalled repo? Post whole `make` output.
